name: Pensions and Lifetime Savings Association
goal:
The Pensions and Lifetime Savings Association is the voice of workplace pensions and lifetime savingsin the UK. We speak for over 1,400 pension schemes that provide pensions for over 20 million people and have more than ?1.100 billion of assets.

We also have 400 members from businesses supporting the pensions sector.

We aim to help everyone get more out of their retirement savings. To do this we spread best practice among our members, challenge regulation where it adds more cost than benefit and promote policies that add value for savers.
